alternativeNames: Bongard, Heinrich Gustav; Bongard, Gustav Petrovich
comments: Published as 'H. G. Bongard' or 'H.-G. Bongard' or 'M.(Monsieur) Bongard'
examples: Eriocaulon affine Bong. in Mem. Acad. Imp. Sci. St.-Petersbourg, ser. 6, 1: 621 (1831)
source: Pichi Sermolli's list, 3 March 1991. Bot. Zhurn., 88(2): 125-133 (2003), some biogr. details in article about his herbarium.
